attributes.action: Overrule the Welsh Assembly M4 Relief Road decision and build it ASAP
attributes.background: Overturn the decline decision to build the M4 Relief Road around Newport and build it ASAP in the UK national interest

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it or overturn a decision.

The Welsh Assembly has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Assembly, you can find out more here:

http://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
